attributes.comment:
We would like to voice our concern over the proposed filing fee increases. This
would raise the cost of international adoption by several hunderd dollars!
International adoption is already a very large financial commitment and this would
make it more difficult for families that are considering adoption. We are in the
process of adoption and have had to submit the current fee twice as the time limit
expired on our approval. The expiration dates should be reviewed as well but that
is another issue. We feel this it is wrong to raise the fees as it may prohibit
families from considering adoption. Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jill and Roger Dillon
